question: 痩身
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>thin</kanji> <kanji>body</kanji> type is called <vocabulary>lean</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>slim</vocabulary>. These days this is usually used in the context of <vocabulary>slimming</vocabulary> salons and massages you can get that may or may not work.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You've learned them already, so you should be able to read this on your own!
